00056 /* FIXME: we should do something reasonable when malloc() fails, but
00057    since Linux lies about whether it can provide memory, there may be
00058    no point. */
00059 
00061 static inline void *aa_malloc0( size_t size ) {
00062     void *p = malloc(size);
00063     if(p) memset(p,0,size);
00064     return p;
00065 }
00066 
00068 static inline void aa_free_if_valid( void *ptr ) {
00069     if( NULL != ptr ) free(ptr);
00070 }
00071 
00073 #define AA_NEW_AR(type,n) ( (type*) malloc(sizeof(type)*(n)) )
00074 
00076 #define AA_NEW0_AR(type,n) ( (type*) aa_malloc0(sizeof(type)*(n)) )
00077 
00079 #define AA_NEW(type) AA_NEW_AR(type,1)
00080 
00082 #define AA_NEW0(type) AA_NEW0_AR(type,1)

00086 #define AA_ALIGN2( val, align ) (((val) + (align) - 1) & ~(align-1))

00107 #define AA_ALLOCAL(size) ({ size_t aa_$_allocal_size = (size);          \
00108             aa_$_allocal_size > AA_ALLOC_STACK_MAX ?                    \
00109                 malloc(aa_$_allocal_size) : alloca(aa_$_allocal_size);   })
00110 
00115 #define AA_NEW_LOCAL(type, n) ( (type*) AA_ALLOCAL( sizeof(type)*(n) ) )

00122 static inline void aa_frlocal( void *ptr, size_t size ) {
00123     if( size > AA_ALLOC_STACK_MAX) free(ptr);
00124 }
00125 
00127 #define AA_DEL_LOCAL(ptr, type, n) aa_frlocal( ptr, sizeof(type)*(n) )

00341 #define AA_FAR(...) ((double[]){__VA_ARGS__})
00342 
00344 static inline void aa_fcpy( double *dst, const double *src, size_t n ) {
00345     memcpy( dst, src, sizeof( dst[0] ) * n );
00346 }
00347 
00349 static inline void aa_fset( double *dst, double val, size_t n ) {
00350     for( size_t i = 0; i < n; i ++ )
00351         dst[i] = val;
00352 }
00353 
00355 static inline void aa_zero( void *p, size_t n ) {
00356     memset(p,0,n);
00357 }
00358 
00360 static inline void aa_fzero( double *p, size_t n ) {
00361     aa_zero(p,n*sizeof(double));
00362 }
00363 
00365 #define AA_ZERO_AR( var ) aa_zero( var, sizeof(var) )
00366 
00368 #define AA_SET_AR( var, val )                                   \
00369     for( size_t aa_$_set_ar_i = 0;                              \
00370          aa_$_set_ar_i < sizeof(var)/sizeof(var[0]);            \
00371          aa_$_set_ar_i ++ ) var[aa_$_set_ar_i] = val;
